page.title: 17ENTERTAINMENT.
page.content: {Leisure and Entertainment: Local {Entertainment.}Our area does not have many entertainments so we make our own. Churchill Primary School Fete, Burrington Church Fete, and Langford Church Fete. For the children there are two small playgrounds with swings, slides, and a wooden castle. There are playing fields for public use. There is a Sports Centre in the nearby comprehensive school. At Burrington and Churchill there is a bell ringing and choir practice, once a week. The Womans Institute meets once a month. There are skittles and darts matches. For the children, there are Scouts, Brownies, Guides, and Cubs once a week. Many people enjoy going to the pub for a drink and a chat.
